description:
In this Teacher's Superpowers series course, we will take a look at Socrative.

Socrative is a great tool to use in class. It helps you engage with your students and gather feedback on any kind of subject. You can run lengthy quizzes, transforming the way you do assessments or quick one question quizzes.

In this course we will cover every part of the app:

  • how to create an account
  • how to create a quiz
  • how to run activities and see per student progress
  • how to download reports for past activities and how to interpret them


If you are a teacher and you would like to start using a simple tool in your class that can have a great impact, Socrative is perfect and this course covers every aspect of it.

Start using this superpower.

title: Teacher's Superpowers: How to Use Socrative In Class
